actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: Joint resolution to establish the Commission on the Political Status of Guam, to study and recommend changes in the Guam Organic Act and the political status of Guam.

summary.text: Creates a seven-member Commission on the Political Status of Guam. Directs the Commission to conduct a complete evaluation of the Organic Act of Guam, recommend possible changes in the Act and report to Congress what political status would be most appropriate for Guam. Provides the Commission with the authority to hold hearings and issue subpenas. Authorizes the Commission to spend any funds it deems necessary to accomplish the purpose of this Act.

titles.title: Joint resolution to establish the Commission on the Political Status of Guam, to study and recommend changes in the Guam Organic Act and the political status of Guam.
